question: Which of the following cities is the venue of the 6th International Geriatric Orthopaedic Society of India Conference 2018?
explanation: The 6th International Geriatric Orthopaedic Society of India Conference 2018 has been inaugurated by Union Home Minister Shri Rajnath Singh at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS) in New Delhi on September 7. The purpose of the conference is to spread awareness about the health needs of the ageing population and to bring together everyone involved in geriatric orthopaedic care under one roof to interact and arrive at consensus on best practices. It\'s theme is “Increased Longevity with Reduced Fragility and Enhanced Mobility”.
